tv.ouya.console.api.metrics  

Ouya API Documentation

The main entry point for the ODK is the OuyaFacade. It contains methods that use Android's Binder architecture to pass requests through the framework and from there to the Ouya servers. Results and error conditions are reported asynchronously via OuyaResponseListener objects.
